talents.name: Ambidextrous
talents.description: Reduce penalties for using two weapons.

talents.name: Arcane Sense
talents.description: Can reroll failed magic sense roll, with a penalty of -10.

talents.name: Blind Fighting
talents.description: Eliminates melee combat penalties for obscured vision.

talents.name: Catfall
talents.description: Reduce falling damage.

talents.name: Clues from the Crowds
talents.description: Can re-roll a test made to gather information from a group.

talents.name: Die hard
talents.description: Test Willpower to avoid Fatigue from Blood Loss.

talents.name: Disarm
talents.description: Force opponent to drop weapon.

talents.name: Double Team
talents.description: Gain additional +10 for outnumbering opponent.

talents.name: Enemy
talents.description: An organization or group particularly despises the character.

talents.name: Frenzy
talents.description: Enter psychotic rage to gain combat bonuses.

talents.name: Iron Jaw
talents.description: Test Toughness to overcome Stunning.

talents.name: Jaded
talents.description: Ignore mundane horrors.

talents.name: Keen Intuition
talents.description: Can retry Awareness test once with –10 modifier.

talents.name: Leap Up
talents.description: Stand as a Free Action.

talents.name: Never Quit
talents.description: The toughness bonus counts as two level higher for fatigue thresholds.

talents.name: Nowhere to Hide
talents.description: Can add DoS from the attack to reduce armour value of cover.

talents.name: Peer
talents.description: Character has good reputation amongst chosen group.

talents.name: Resistance
talents.description: Gain +10 bonus to particular resistance test.

talents.name: Quick Draw
talents.description: Draw a weapon as a Free Action.

talents.name: Rapid Reload
talents.description: Reduce reload time.

talents.name: Sound Constitution
talents.description: Gain two additional wounds in each location.

talents.name: Specialist
talents.description: Can roll knowledge tests without penalties against the given domain.

talents.name: Takedown
talents.description: Make special attack to stun opponent.

talents.name: Weapon Training
talents.description: Use weapon group without penalty.

talents.name: Battle rage
talents.description: Parry while frenzied.

talents.name: Chaos Conduit
talents.description: Spend Fate point to add 1d5 to magic rating.

talents.name: Combat Master
talents.description: Opponents get no bonus for outnumbering the character.

talents.name: Constant Vigilance
talents.description: Can use Per or Int instead of Ag for Initiative rolls, and rolls two dice (picking higher) for the result.

talents.name: Contact Network
talents.description: +10 bonus to all Interrogate tests, additional +5 for others who also have Coordinated Interrogation.

talents.name: Counter Attack
talents.description: May attack after successful Parry.

talents.name: Deny the Witch
talents.description: Can use Willpower to Evade against magic attacks.

talents.name: Devastating Assault
talents.description: A successful All Out Attack grants a second attack.

talents.name: Double Tap
talents.description: Successful first attack grants bonus to second attack.

talents.name: Exotic Weapon Training
talents.description: Gain proficiency with one exotic weapon type.

talents.name: Face in a Crowd
talents.description: Can use Fellowship instead of Agility when Shadowing.

talents.name: Hard Target
talents.description: –20 to hit character when he Charges or Runs.

talents.name: Hardy
talents.description: Character considers wounds one degree lighter for natural recovery.

talents.name: Hatred
talents.description: Gain +10 bonus to attack hated creatures.

talents.name: Hip Shooting
talents.description: Characters may shoot when moving.

talents.name: Independent Targeting
talents.description: Fire at multiple targets more than 10 metres apart.

talents.name: Killing strike
talents.description: Add the DoS to the attack damage.

talents.name: Marksman
talents.description: No penalties for firing at long or extreme range.

talents.name: Precision Killer
talents.description: No penalty to making Called Shot

talents.name: Strong Minded
talents.description: May reroll failed WP tests to resist magic attacks.

talents.name: Swift Attack
talents.description: May make multiple melee attacks.

talents.name: Two-Weapon Wielder
talents.description: May fight with two weapons in melee combat.

talents.name: Unarmed Specialist
talents.description: When fighting unarmed, attacks hit as Deadly Natural Weapons.

talents.name: Whirlwind of Death
talents.description: Make one attack for each melee opponent.

talents.name: Adamantium Faith
talents.description: Reduces DoF from failed Pinning and Fear tests.

talents.name: Assassin Strike
talents.description: After melee attack, test Acrobatics to move.

talents.name: Bastion of Iron Will
talents.description: Gain bonus for Opposed tests against psychic powers.

talents.name: Blademaster
talents.description: Reroll missed attack, once per round.

talents.name: Brutal assault
talents.description: A successful All Out Attack grants additional attacks.

talents.name: Chaos Lock
talents.description: Ignore Psychic Phenomenon once per week.

talents.name: Deathdealer
talents.description: Add Per bonus to critical damage inflicted in combat.

talents.name: Eye of Vengeance
talents.description: Spend 1 Fate point to increase damage and penetration.

talents.name: Flash of Insight
talents.description: Spend 1 Fate point to reveal a clue.

talents.name: Halo of Command
talents.description: Affect NPCs within 100xFelB metres with Social skills.

talents.name: Hammer Blow
talents.description: Make a thunderous strike with a melee weapon.

talents.name: Infused Knowledge
talents.description: Know a little bit about everything.

talents.name: Lightning Attack
talents.description: Character may make many melee attacks with single roll.

talents.name: Never Die
talents.description: Ignore penalties from Critical damage by spending Fate point.

talents.name: Preternatural Speed
talents.description: Double speed when charging.

talents.name: Sprint
talents.description: Move more quickly in combat.

talents.name: Step Aside
talents.description: Can make additional Dodge or Parry attempt.

talents.name: Superior Chirurgeon
talents.description: Treats wounds one degree lighter for medicae tests.

talents.name: Target Selection
talents.description: May shoot into melee without penalty.

talents.name: Thunder Charge
talents.description: Break enemies with armoured charge.

talents.name: True Grit
talents.description: Reduce Critical damage taken by TOU bonus.

talents.name: Two-Weapon Master
talents.description: No penalties when fighting with two single-handed weapons.

spells.name: Sanction
spells.description: Increases the DoF or damages taken by target as a reaction.

spells.name: Primal fire burst
spells.description: Deals minor fire damage to the target.

spells.name: Fervor Wave
spells.description: Daze targets nearby, or stuns them if they fail an opposed WIL test.
